Prequisites @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Leshy Familiar Secrets]

When your familiar dies,it releases its primal energy to cast the 3-action version of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal], heightened to a level 1 lower than your highest-level spell slot. The heal spell gains a status bonus equal to twice the spell's level to the Hit Points it restores to plants. You must be able to cast 2nd-level spells using spell slots to select this familiar ability.
